item.name: Angel of Salvation
item.text: Flash; convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Flying When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.

item.name: Augur il-Vec
item.text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Sacrifice Augur il-Vec: You gain 4 life. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
item.flavorText: "If it would end this exile, my life is yours."

item.name: Barren Glory
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no permanents other than Barren Glory and have no cards in hand, you win the game.
item.flavorText: "The only perfect world is an empty world, with no one to sin or wage war." —Tarran, magus of the disk

item.name: Chronomantic Escape
item.text: Until your next turn, creatures can't attack you. Exile Chronomantic Escape with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Dust of Moments
item.text: Choose one — Remove two time counters from each permanent and each suspended card; or put two time counters on each permanent with a time counter on it and each suspended card.

item.name: Even the Odds
item.text: Cast Even the Odds only if you control fewer creatures than each opponent. Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "They who fall singing the battle hymn of Benalia go not unavenged." —Adom Capashen, Benalish commander

item.name: Gift of Granite
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
item.flavorText: The blessing adds both protection to the recipient and weightlessness to the stone.

item.name: Intervention Pact
item.text: Intervention Pact is white. The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {1}{W}{W}. If you don't, you lose the game.

item.name: Judge Unworthy
item.text: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Judge Unworthy deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Knight of Sursi
item.text: Flying; flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Suspend 3—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.name: Lost Auramancers
item.text: Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Lost Auramancers is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it had no time counters on it, you may search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

item.name: Magus of the Moat
item.text: Creatures without flying can't attack.
item.flavorText: "The spirits of the mythic ones ever circle their beloved keep, forbidding entry to all who come with the heavy tread of hate."

item.name: Marshaling Cry
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.name: Saltskitter
item.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, exile Saltskitter. Return Saltskitter to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Samite Censer-Bearer
item.text: {W}, Sacrifice Samite Censer-Bearer: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to each creature you control this turn.
item.flavorText: Samite alchemists extracted aromatic traces of healing minerals from the residue of the receding salt dunes.

item.name: Scout's Warning
item.text: The next creature card you play this turn can be played as though it had flash. Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "There is no tactic I enjoy more than ambushing the ambushers."

item.name: Spirit en-Dal
item.text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Spirit en-Dal from your hand: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

item.name: Aven Mindcensor
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.

item.name: Bound in Silence
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
item.flavorText: A fight put off forever is already won.

item.name: Daybreak Coronet
item.text: Enchant creature with another Aura attached to it Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has first strike, vigilance, and lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

item.name: Goldmeadow Lookout
item.text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token named Goldmeadow Harrier onto the battlefield. It has "{W}, {T}: Tap target creature."

item.name: Imperial Mask
item.text: When Imperial Mask enters the battlefield, if it's not a token, each of your teammates puts a token that's a copy of Imperial Mask onto the battlefield. You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

item.name: Lucent Liminid
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: It is a herald of the sun goddess, projected from the hallowed glass whenever her light passes through.

item.name: Lumithread Field
item.text: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: Having conquered the Bastion of Suns, the Ota took its light for their own.

item.name: Lymph Sliver
item.text: All Sliver creatures have absorb 1. (If a source would deal damage to a Sliver, prevent 1 of that damage.)
item.flavorText: Its skin remains in a flowing, liquid state that keeps its body coated with potent restorative lymph.

item.name: Mistmeadow Skulk
item.text: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater
item.flavorText: Doyo suspected the boggarts of brewing a plot against his crop, so he scythed away his grain to clear the sightlines.

item.name: Oriss, Samite Guardian
item.text: {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Grandeur — Discard another card named Oriss, Samite Guardian: Target player can't cast spells this turn, and creatures that player controls can't attack this turn.

item.name: Patrician's Scorn
item.text: If you've cast another white spell this turn, you may cast Patrician's Scorn without paying its mana cost. Destroy all enchantments.
item.flavorText: Lady Farisa's contempt of tawdry kitsch grew even more infamous after her death.

item.name: Ramosian Revivalist
item.text: {6}, {T}: Return target Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
item.flavorText: The Ramosian tradition is alive, but its namesake has long since been forgotten.

item.name: Seht's Tiger
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Seht's Tiger enters the battlefield, you gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of the chosen color.)

item.name: Aven Augur
item.text: Flying Sacrifice Aven Augur: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
item.flavorText: "I have seen the future. It does not include you."

item.name: Cloudseeder
item.text: Flying {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token named Cloud Sprite onto the battlefield. It has flying and "Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying."

item.name: Cryptic Annelid
item.text: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Delay
item.text: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

item.name: Foresee
item.text: Scry 4, then draw two cards. (To scry 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
item.flavorText: Wind time's watch, and watch time unwind.

item.name: Infiltrator il-Kor
item.text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Suspend 2—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.name: Leaden Fists
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.name: Maelstrom Djinn
item.text: Flying Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Maelstrom Djinn is turned face up, put two time counters on it and it gains vanishing. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

item.name: Magus of the Future
item.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library.
item.flavorText: Those gifted with the sight have one eye in the present and the other in the future.

item.name: Mystic Speculation
item.text: Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Scry 3. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Pact of Negation
item.text: Pact of Negation is blue. Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.
item.flavorText: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

item.name: Reality Strobe
item.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Exile Reality Strobe with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Take Possession
item.text: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Enchant permanent You control enchanted permanent.

item.name: Unblinking Bleb
item.text: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) Whenever Unblinking Bleb or another permanent is turned face up, you may scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

item.name: Venser's Diffusion
item.text: Return target nonland permanent or suspended card to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Each reality is but the dream of another, and each sleeper a god unknowing."

item.name: Arcanum Wings
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Aura swap {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
item.flavorText: Nobles don wings to reach the sky villas of their peers, exchanging them for more fashionable attire upon arrival.

item.name: Bonded Fetch
item.text: Defender, haste {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
item.flavorText: A well-made homunculus grooms the mind of its master, pruning the thoughts that lead to madness. Few loredelvers survive the study of the infinite without one.

item.name: Linessa, Zephyr Mage
item.text: {X}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. Grandeur — Discard another card named Linessa, Zephyr Mage: Target player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land.

item.name: Logic Knot
item.text: Delve (You may exile any number of cards from your graveyard as you cast this spell. It costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

item.name: Mesmeric Sliver
item.text: All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may fateseal 1." (To fateseal 1, its controller looks at the top card of an opponent's library, then he or she may put that card on the bottom of that library.)

item.name: Narcomoeba
item.text: Flying When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: It was created by the Iquati as a living memory—one that objects to being forgotten.

item.name: Nix
item.text: Counter target spell if no mana was spent to cast it.
item.flavorText: "There is no shortcut to work done true and well. The Creators learned this to their sorrow, the first time they made the world." —Githri the Prisoner

item.name: Sarcomite Myr
item.text: {2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: "A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical." —Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

item.name: Second Wind
item.text: Enchant creature {T}: Tap enchanted creature. {T}: Untap enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: Vindr stormchasers believe that the same ancient forces that move the winds can also move mortal minds and hearts.

item.name: Shapeshifter's Marrow
item.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a creature card, the player puts the card into his or her graveyard and Shapeshifter's Marrow becomes a copy of that card. (If it does, it loses this ability.)

item.name: Spellweaver Volute
item.text: Enchant instant card in a graveyard Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, copy the enchanted instant card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile the enchanted card and attach Spellweaver Volute to another instant card in a graveyard.

item.name: Spin into Myth
item.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library, then fateseal 2. (To fateseal 2, look at the top two cards of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Vedalken Æthermage
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Vedalken Æthermage enters the battlefield, return target Sliver to its owner's hand. Wizardcycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Wizard card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Whip-Spine Drake
item.text: Flying Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: "I swear the clouds were created just so the drakes would have a place to lurk." —Kasharri, skyknight

item.name: Augur of Skulls
item.text: {1}{B}: Regenerate Augur of Skulls. Sacrifice Augur of Skulls: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
item.flavorText: Within each empty skull, it seeks ways to preserve its own failing undeath.

item.name: Cutthroat il-Dal
item.text: Hellbent — Cutthroat il-Dal has shadow as long as you have no cards in hand. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
item.flavorText: Her blades slashed across the noble's shadow. He scoffed, then fell over dead.

item.name: Festering March
item.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Exile Festering March with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{B} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Gibbering Descent
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life and discards a card. Hellbent — Skip your upkeep step if you have no cards in hand. Madness {2}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

item.name: Grave Peril
item.text: When a nonblack creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Grave Peril. If you do, destroy that creature.
item.flavorText: "Sometimes the grave does not wait for death before relishing its feast of flesh and bones." —Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

item.name: Ichor Slick
item.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) Madness {3}{B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

item.name: Lost Hours
item.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player puts that card into his or her library third from the top.
item.flavorText: "Your thoughts do not interest me nearly as much as the absence thereof." —Gorghul, augur of skulls

item.name: Magus of the Abyss
item.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of his or her choice. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

item.name: Minions' Murmurs
item.text: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.
item.flavorText: "They are quick to offer advice, those whose mistakes doomed them to undeath. How can I not listen to the wisdom of failure?" —Ratadrabik of Urborg

item.name: Nihilith
item.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Suspend 7—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with seven time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Nihilith is suspended, you may remove a time counter from Nihilith.

item.name: Oblivion Crown
item.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Discard a card: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

item.name: Pooling Venom
item.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life. {3}{B}: Destroy enchanted land.
item.flavorText: The land can only hold so much poison before it begins to bite back.

item.name: Putrid Cyclops
item.text: When Putrid Cyclops enters the battlefield, scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. Putrid Cyclops gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.name: Shimian Specter
item.text: Flying Whenever Shimian Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Skirk Ridge Exhumer
item.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 black Zombie Goblin creature token named Festering Goblin onto the battlefield. It has "When Festering Goblin is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."

item.name: Slaughter Pact
item.text: Slaughter Pact is black. Destroy target nonblack creature. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.
item.flavorText: Death is only the beginning of the end.

item.name: Stronghold Rats
item.text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.) Whenever Stronghold Rats deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card.
item.flavorText: In the stronghold's dungeons, the shadows hide in the vermin.

item.name: Bitter Ordeal
item.text: Search target player's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Gravestorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.name: Bridge from Below
item.text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield. When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

item.name: Death Rattle
item.text: Delve (You may exile any number of cards from your graveyard as you cast this spell. It costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way.) Destroy target nongreen creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Deepcavern Imp
item.text: Flying, haste Echo—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

item.name: Fleshwrither
item.text: Transfigure {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a creature card with the same converted mana cost as this creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Transfigure only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Frenzy Sliver
item.text: All Sliver creatures have frenzy 1. (Whenever a Sliver attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
item.flavorText: The Arturan conjurers took the strange, alien fossil and patterned their own twisted creations in its image.

item.name: Grave Scrabbler
item.text: Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.) When Grave Scrabbler enters the battlefield, if its madness cost was paid, you may return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

item.name: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade
item.text: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control. {1}{B}: Regenerate Korlash. Grandeur — Discard another card named Korlash, Heir to Blackblade: Search your library for up to two Swamp cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.name: Snake Cult Initiation
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has poisonous 3. (Whenever it deals combat damage to a player, that player gets three poison counters. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

item.name: Street Wraith
item.text: Swampwalk Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

item.name: Tombstalker
item.text: Flying Delve (You may exile any number of cards from your graveyard as you cast this spell. It costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way.)

item.name: Witch's Mist
item.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
item.flavorText: "Hear us, Overmother. Let the strong thrive under your gelatinous hand, and let the weak writhe under your serrated heel." —Prayer of the devoted

item.name: Yixlid Jailer
item.text: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.
item.flavorText: "I have an eternity to know the souls who are bound here, to behold their every facet. But moments from now they will be gagged and masked, and they shall be known by none other."

item.name: Arc Blade
item.text: Arc Blade deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Exile Arc Blade with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Bogardan Lancer
item.text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

item.name: Char-Rumbler
item.text: Double strike {R}: Char-Rumbler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Elementals flourished as Dominaria healed and new forms of life adapted to the land's reinfusion with mana.

item.name: Emberwilde Augur
item.text: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
item.flavorText: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

item.name: Fatal Attraction
item.text: Enchant creature When Fatal Attraction enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, Fatal Attraction deals 4 damage to enchanted creature.

item.name: Gathan Raiders
item.text: Hellbent — Gathan Raiders gets +2/+2 if you have no cards in hand. Morph—Discard a card. (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Haze of Rage
item.text: Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.name: Magus of the Moon
item.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
item.flavorText: Tidal forces of the blood moon wrench and buckle the land, drawing monoliths of stone and soil toward the flaming orb.

item.name: Molten Disaster
item.text: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) If Molten Disaster was kicked, it has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Molten Disaster deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

item.name: Pact of the Titan
item.text: Pact of the Titan is red. Put a 4/4 red Giant creature token onto the battlefield. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {4}{R}. If you don't, you lose the game.

item.name: Pyromancer's Swath
item.text: If an instant or sorcery source you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that creature or player instead. At the beginning of each end step, discard your hand.

item.name: Riddle of Lightning
item.text: Choose target creature or player. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Riddle of Lightning deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Rift Elemental
item.text: {1}{R}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control or suspended card you own: Rift Elemental gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "It's difficult to heal a rift after it begins wandering about on its own." —Teferi

item.name: Scourge of Kher Ridges
item.text: Flying {1}{R}: Scourge of Kher Ridges deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {5}{R}: Scourge of Kher Ridges deals 6 damage to each other creature with flying.
item.flavorText: Doom casts its own flickering shadow.

item.name: Shivan Sand-Mage
item.text: When Shivan Sand-Mage enters the battlefield, choose one — Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card; or put two time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card. Suspend 4—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.name: Sparkspitter
item.text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 3/1 red Elemental creature token named Spark Elemental onto the battlefield. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental."

item.name: Bloodshot Trainee
item.text: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.
item.flavorText: "Hrrngh Someday I'm going to hurl this . . . er . . . roll this . . . hrrngh . . . nudge this boulder right down a cliff."

item.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
item.text: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

item.name: Emblem of the Warmind
item.text: Enchant creature you control Creatures you control have haste.
item.flavorText: "It takes but one spark to ignite a parched forest. Our hearts, I fear, are too dry for this new visitor." —Elek Longbeard

item.name: Flowstone Embrace
item.text: Enchant creature {T}: Enchanted creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The seventh symbol, the Mark of Stone, stores the power of ancient Rath." —Tome of Elemental Mastery

item.name: Ghostfire
item.text: Ghostfire is colorless. Ghostfire deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

item.name: Grinning Ignus
item.text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {2}{R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
item.flavorText: "Take care what you offer the ignus. Food, perhaps. Coins. But nothing flammable" —Stovic, village eccentric

item.name: Henchfiend of Ukor
item.text: Haste Echo {1}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice this permanent unless you pay its echo cost.) {BR}: Henchfiend of Ukor gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.name: Homing Sliver
item.text: Each Sliver card in each player's hand has slivercycling {3}. Slivercycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

item.name: Shah of Naar Isle
item.text: Trample Echo {0} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Shah of Naar Isle's echo cost is paid, each opponent may draw up to three cards.

item.name: Skizzik Surger
item.text: Haste Echo—Sacrifice two lands. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

item.name: Steamflogger Boss
item.text: Other Rigger creatures you control get +1/+0 and have haste. If a Rigger you control would assemble a Contraption, it assembles two Contraptions instead.
item.flavorText: "Whip the Xs Pinch the Os What we're building, no one knows"

item.name: Storm Entity
item.text: Haste Storm Entity enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.
item.flavorText: Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.

item.name: Tarox Bladewing
item.text: Flying, haste Grandeur — Discard another card named Tarox Bladewing: Tarox Bladewing gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
item.flavorText: Despising his siblings as insults to his line, he finds and devours each in turn.

item.name: Thunderblade Charge
item.text: Thunderblade Charge deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Thunderblade Charge is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{R}{R}{R}. If you do, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

item.name: Cyclical Evolution
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Exile Cyclical Evolution with three time counters on it. Suspend 3—{2}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Force of Savagery
item.text: Trample
item.flavorText: "Life cannot be created and then abandoned. It must be nurtured and fed so that it may express its ripened might." —Freyalise

item.name: Heartwood Storyteller
item.text: Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, each of that player's opponents may draw a card.
item.flavorText: His roots reach deep, nurtured not by soil and rain, but by millennia of experience.

item.name: Kavu Primarch
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its total cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

item.name: Llanowar Augur
item.text: Sacrifice Llanowar Augur: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
item.flavorText: "I am irrelevant. The future I hold in my hands is everything."

item.name: Llanowar Empath
item.text: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.name: Llanowar Mentor
item.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token named Llanowar Elves onto the battlefield. It has "{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool."

item.name: Magus of the Vineyard
item.text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.
item.flavorText: Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.

item.name: Petrified Plating
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.name: Quiet Disrepair
item.text: Enchant artifact or enchantment At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one — Destroy enchanted permanent; or you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Artifice has always stood upon nature's shoulders. Let us watch nature take a turn." —Freyalise

item.name: Ravaging Riftwurm
item.text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) If Ravaging Riftwurm was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three additional time counters on it.

item.name: Riftsweeper
item.text: When Riftsweeper enters the battlefield, choose target face-up exiled card. Its owner shuffles it into his or her library.
item.flavorText: "Beings of the rifts are not natural. No longer will these abominations tread upon the body of Gaea."

item.name: Rites of Flourishing
item.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Each player may play an additional land on each of his or her turns.
item.flavorText: "Dance, and bring forth the coil It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

item.name: Sprout Swarm
item.text: Convoke (Each creature you tap while casting this spell reduces its total cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.) Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

item.name: Summoner's Pact
item.text: Summoner's Pact is green. Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

item.name: Utopia Mycon
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Utopia Mycon. Remove three spore counters from Utopia Mycon: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. Sacrifice a Saproling: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

item.name: Wrap in Vigor
item.text: Regenerate each creature you control.
item.flavorText: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

item.name: Baru, Fist of Krosa
item.text: Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield, green creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. Grandeur — Discard another card named Baru, Fist of Krosa: Put an X/X green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of lands you control.

item.name: Centaur Omenreader
item.text: As long as Centaur Omenreader is tapped, creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
item.flavorText: The wisdom of the omenreaders is legendary. Creatures travel for miles through icy peril to seek their counsel.

item.name: Edge of Autumn
item.text: If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
item.flavorText: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

item.name: Imperiosaur
item.text: Spend only mana produced by basic lands to cast Imperiosaur.
item.flavorText: "An ancient, powerful force has overtaken the valley. I sympathize for its former inhabitants, but I rejoice for the land itself." —Olanti, Muraganda druid

item.name: Muraganda Petroglyphs
item.text: Creatures with no abilities get +2/+2.
item.flavorText: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.

item.name: Nacatl War-Pride
item.text: Nacatl War-Pride must be blocked by exactly one creature if able. Whenever Nacatl War-Pride attacks, put X tokens that are copies of Nacatl War-Pride onto the battlefield tapped and attacking, where X is the number of creatures defending player controls. Exile the tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Phosphorescent Feast
item.text: Chroma — Reveal any number of cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each green mana symbol in those cards' mana costs.
item.flavorText: "Mushroom Queen sits among her spores, Enjoying life and avoiding chores." —Ibblian pixie ditty

item.name: Quagnoth
item.text: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.) When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Quagnoth, return it to your hand.

item.name: Spellwild Ouphe
item.text: Spells that target Spellwild Ouphe cost {2} less to cast.
item.flavorText: "You'd think that their big glowing eyes would be almost hypnotic to look at. In fact, it's the other way around—they are entranced by nearly everything they see." —Balecki, Spellwild druid

item.name: Sporoloth Ancient
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Sporoloth Ancient. Creatures you control have "Remove two spore counters from this creature: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield."

item.name: Tarmogoyf
item.text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1. (The card types are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal.)

item.name: Thornweald Archer
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Deathtouch (Creatures dealt damage by this creature are destroyed. You can divide this creature's combat damage among any of the creatures blocking or blocked by it.)
item.flavorText: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

item.name: Virulent Sliver
item.text: All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

item.name: Glittering Wish
item.text: You may choose a multicolored card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Glittering Wish.
item.flavorText: She wished for gold, but not for the strength to carry it.

item.name: Jhoira of the Ghitu
item.text: {2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

item.name: Sliver Legion
item.text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1 for each other Sliver on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Hidden within the clicking, chittering swarm is a unique mind, still young, but growing more aware as time passes.

item.name: Akroma's Memorial
item.text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.
item.flavorText: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what." —Memorial inscription

item.name: Cloud Key
item.text: As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery. Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
item.flavorText: The musical sound of its turning triggers the tumblers of revelation.

item.name: Coalition Relic
item.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each counter removed this way.

item.name: Epochrasite
item.text: Epochrasite enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand. When Epochrasite is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, exile it with three time counters on it and it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast tihs card without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

item.name: Sliversmith
item.text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 colorless Sliver artifact creature token named Metallic Sliver onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: After centuries of labor, its creations outnumber those they were to mimic.

item.name: Soultether Golem
item.text: Vanishing 1 (This permanent enters the battlefield with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a time counter on Soultether Golem.

item.name: Sword of the Meek
Veilstone Amulet
item.text: Whenever you cast a spell, creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn.
item.flavorText: Sometimes it's ostentatious to go unseen.

item.name: Darksteel Garrison
item.text: Fortified land is indestructible. Whenever fortified land becomes tapped, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Fortify {3} ({3}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the land leaves.)

item.name: Whetwheel
item.text: {X}{X}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Morph {3} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.name: Dakmor Salvage
item.text: Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

item.name: Keldon Megaliths
item.text: Keldon Megaliths enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Hellbent — {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

item.name: Llanowar Reborn
item.text: Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

item.name: New Benalia
item.text: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped. When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

item.name: Tolaria West
item.text: Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost 0, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

item.name: Dryad Arbor
item.text: (Dryad Arbor isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, and it has "{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.") Dryad Arbor is green.
item.flavorText: "Touch no tree, break no branch, and speak only the question you wish answered." —Von Yomm, elder druid, to her initiates

item.name: Graven Cairns
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {BR}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: Shamans of Kar-Sengir claim that their sun sets because it can no longer bear the gaze of those pain-carved cliffs.

item.name: Grove of the Burnwillows
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Each opponent gains 1 life.
item.flavorText: Spring is the most beautiful season in the grove, when the new leaves open from their ember-buds in a race of leaping flames.

item.name: Horizon Canopy
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Canopy: Draw a card.
item.flavorText: The great leaves are resilient underfoot. Heavy steps do not bruise them, but release a sweet and spicy scent.

item.name: Nimbus Maze
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control an Island. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Plains.
item.flavorText: To find its center is to find one's own.

item.name: River of Tears
item.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. If you played a land this turn, add {B} to your mana pool instead.
item.flavorText: "The Westfolk wept, and their tears wore winding rivers into the cheek of the world." —Glem the Lonebard, "Origins of Kholon"

item.name: Zoetic Cavern
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. Morph {2} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
item.flavorText: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
